definition: goods carried by a large vehicle, corrupt, debase, or make impure by adding a foreign or inferior substance
details:
noun
- goods carried by a large vehicle
= synonyms: shipment
- weight to be borne or conveyed
= synonyms: loading
- electrical device to which electrical power is delivered
- the front part of a guided missile or rocket or torpedo that carries the nuclear or explosive charge or the chemical or biological agents
= synonyms: payload, warhead
- an onerous or difficult concern
= synonyms: encumbrance, incumbrance, burden, onus
- a deposit of valuable ore occurring within definite boundaries separating it from surrounding rocks
= synonyms: lode
- the power output of a generator or power plant
- an amount of alcohol sufficient to intoxicate
= example: an amount of alcohol sufficient to intoxicate
- a quantity that can be processed or transported at one time
= example: a quantity that can be processed or transported at one time
= synonyms: loading
verb
- corrupt, debase, or make impure by adding a foreign or inferior substance
= synonyms: dilute
- fill or place a load on
= example: fill or place a load on
= synonyms: laden
- provide a device with something necessary
= example: provide a device with something necessary
= synonyms: charge
- put (something) on a structure or conveyance
= example: put (something) on a structure or conveyance
- transfer from a storage device to a computer's memory
